data.name: Mensa (Student Cafeteria)
data.description: Discounted meals for students at university canteens (Mensa). A full meal can cost between 3€ and 5€.

data.name: Bus & Minimetrò Pass
data.description: Students can get a discounted monthly or annual pass for public transportation in Perugia.

data.name: Museums and Cinemas
data.description: Many museums and cinemas in Perugia offer reduced ticket prices for students upon presenting a valid student ID.
